subject: Sexual Health
title: Why Sex Evolved
description: A quick win: understand Why Sex Evolved.

hook.text: Sex is costly. Finding a mate takes energy and risk. So why did evolution favor it over simple cloning?

buildup.text: The Red Queen hypothesis says organisms must constantly evolve just to survive against parasites.

discovery.text: Sex shuffles genes each generation, producing offspring that parasites haven't yet adapted to fight.

twist.text: Asexual species often thrive briefly then collapse. They cannot adapt fast enough when threats shift.

climax.text: Sex evolved not for pleasure or bonding but as a defense against an ever-changing biological world.

punchline.text: Sex is evolution's answer to a changing world.

quiz.question: According to the Red Queen hypothesis, why did sex evolve?
options: To help species keep pace with evolving parasites
